text: 1.17: Mt 3.171.17: Mt 17.1-5; Mk 9.2-7; Ru 9.28-35Nza Ndia Fhe Bakɨme zɨ bakɨmen ana nɨɨŋgiap, mba vhava ŋaara vhuun ana nɨɨŋgim, ana anan kav hi. Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara Hevenan mba vhava ŋaara vhuun kav, khaŋ Zisas ga nzuai, “Khe nan Kam ma. Gu guigira won ndavar ana nɨɨŋgiap, ana ndikndigi!”
